title: Audio | Essay: A Secret Danger: Why the Federal Reserve System is Harmful
description:
An audio recording of my essay: A Secret Danger: Why the Federal Reserve System is Harmful. 

See the essay here: https://www.coltonkirby.com/post/a-secret-danger

Make sure to like and subscribe!

Check out my podcast: Fining Ideas | The Colton Kirby Show: https://anchor.fm/coltonkirby
